posts.post_content:
I have three duplicate T212-2's (Baum, Byrd, and Hogan) that I wouldn't mind trading for something. As you can see from the scans, all three cards have creases, and Byrd and Hogan have back problems, though a good soak might help. Byrd also appears to be trimmed.

I'm not necessarily looking for other T212's, though I wouldn't mind them (I have 50 besides these three). I have very eclectic collecting interests, as I described in my introductory thread linked here:

[url]http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=201419[/url]

I prefer raw cards, since I don't have any prewar slabbed cards, and I value eye appeal over more technical considerations (e.g. I don't mind a crease or two or three, as long as a card presents reasonably well).

PM me with any interest/offers.

[IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg98/dkathman1/IMG_20150222_0007.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg98/dkathman1/IMG_20150222_0008.jpg[/IMG]
